product_name: Icebreaker Willow Tank Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Wool in the summer? You bet. This featherweight merino-wool tank top is soft and breathable for total comfort in hot weather. Colorful stripes on the front and a twist in the straps in back add style.
short_description: Wool in the summer? You bet. This featherweight merino-wool tank top is soft and breathable for total comfort in hot weather. Colorful stripes on the front and a twist in the straps in back add style.
